detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print pattern and a motif. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Bikini briefs in patterned microfibre with embroidered text on the front, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved leotard in glossy jersey with a velour front, print motif and appliqué at the top and concealed hook and loop fastening at the back. Glittery elastic seam at the waist, a detachable tail at the back and a glittery skirt in three layers of tulle. Lined gusset.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Pyjamas with a top and leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Parka in a sturdy weave with a fleece-lined drawstring hood with a faux fur trim, two-way zip down the front and double wind flap with a hook and loop fastening. Concealed zipped pocket under the wind flaps, flap chest and front pockets and one sleeve pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets and one inner pocket. Concealed drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Polyester filling. Quilted lining.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, visible zip at the back and wrapover front with a tab and metal D-rings at one side. Lined.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Platform sandals in imitation suede with open toes and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform 4 cm. Heel 11 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist, print motif and lined front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, gathered elastication at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
V-neck jersey nursing top with a wrapover front, concealed press-stud at the top and long sleeves. Practical inner top for ease of nursing access.

Wide tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam and flared peplum at the hem with a pleat at the front.
Knee-length coat in bouclé yarn with wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, a tie belt at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a gentle V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with decorative tie details at the top.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif, concealed press-stud on the shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Cardigan in soft pile with a small glittery embroidered detail at the top. Zip down the front with a heart-shaped tab and chin guard. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing with a glittery stripe around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Elastic bracelets in various styles with wooden and metal beads.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable double shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a slit at the front.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with narrow sides, cutaway coverage at the back and a low waist with covered elastication.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flared leggings in ribbed cotton jersey with a regular, elasticated waist.
Top in airy linen jersey with short flounced sleeves and a deep V-neck with buttons at the top.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Playsuit in soft jersey with broderie anglaise. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Lined at the bottom.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif, stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long, wide sleeves and a folded detail at the shoulders to create a defined silhouette. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers woven in a viscose blend with an extended waistband with a concealed button and a zip fly with a button and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in airy, softly draping silk. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, and discreet pockets in the side seams.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Lined.
Alice band in padded velour with plastic beads on top.
Boxers in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, slightly longer legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Short chiffon dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a frill at the end, and a seam with smocking at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams, side panels, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour trims. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Court shoes with pointed toes and crossover straps at the top with a metal buckle at one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Short, one-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with double flounces at the top. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and soft brushed inside.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Shorter, padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and straight legs.
Scarf in a soft knit with yarn pompoms at the ends. Size 27x190 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length dress in a heavily draping viscose crêpe weave with a raw-edge neckline, pin-tucks and a concealed zip at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves, close-fitting, buttoned cuffs with raw-edge organza trims, and a raw-edge hem. The dress is in a straight cut with width towards the hem. Unlined.
Small elasticated scrunchies in various designs.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and lace details and a fastening at the back.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft jersey. Gently flared top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. Stretchy hairband with a knot detail at the front.

Calf-length shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Reversible bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets at the front, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.

Cardigan in soft faux shearling with a small embroidered detail at the top. Small stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped tab, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and sleeves.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Set with a top and joggers in cotton. Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Super Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hipster briefs in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
